thread.title: Former Neiman Marcus CEO Relishes the ‘Sweet ‘Revenge’ of Success

author: Suzanne Kapner
title: Former Neiman Marcus CEO Relishes the ‘Sweet ‘Revenge’ of Success
text:
The first time Karen Katz applied for a job at Neiman Marcus, she was rejected. A senior at the University of Texas at Austin at the time, she was turned down by the department store’s training program, so the Dallas-native went to Foley’s, whose stores later were renamed as part of Macy’s Inc., while earning her M.B.A. at night at the University of Houston.
Eventually, she joined the company as an assistant store manager, and worked her way up to chief executive during her more-than-three-decade career. “I always say success...
